name: alwaysright
description: New tabs should always open to the immediate right of the current tab. And now they will.

scripts.chrome: cp manifest-chrome.json manifest.json && open -a "Google Chrome" chrome://extensions/
scripts.canary: cp manifest-chrome.json manifest.json && open -a "Google Chrome Canary" chrome://extensions/
scripts.build:chrome: cp manifest-chrome.json manifest.json && zip -r alwaysright-chrome.zip manifest.json service_worker.js always-right-icon-*.png README.md
